a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Historical national accounts estimates of the share of people living below $5 a day, 1820 to
Average incomes measured in national accounts are often much higher than those observed in survey data. As such the poverty rates shown are lower
than corresponding estimates based on survey data â€“ this includes the official estimates produced by the World Bank used to monitor progress against
SDG1. See Roser and Hasell (2021) for further discussion.
Data source: OWID based on Maddison Project Database 2020, van Zanden et al. (2014), de la Escosura (2012)
